subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT

THE PROBLEM WITH PARIS!
Why do so many
people love to hate Paris Hilton? Is Paris's claim she has
become spiritual just an act or the real thing? And are her
parents to blame for the situation she is in right now? Do not
miss this special report on TV's most provocative entertainment
news show, Showbiz Tonight. 

LESSONS FOR PARIS!
What can Paris Hilton learn from former
Hollywood bad girls who have turned it all around? From Drew
Barrymore to Angelina Jolie to Courtney Love, we're taking a
look at former wild child types who have completely changed
their image, to see how they did it.

ANNE HECHE'S
CUSTODY FIGHT
A judge deals Anne Heche a blow in the
nasty custody battle over her son. Why has her soon-to-be ex
husband received custody, and what are the outrageous charges
they're making against each other? Find out tonight on Showbiz
Tonight!

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION OF THE DAY:
Paris Hilton finds God: Do you believe her?
VOTE AT
CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT. 

SEND US A VIDEO
EMAIL!
Send your response to the Question Of The Day
on video. Look into your camera and tell us what you think.
Responses must be no longer than 30 seconds. To send your video
email, go to cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your video responses
on "Showbiz Tonight" at 11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN Headline Prime.
